bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. S.M. McFarland. Issuing of Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: In the District Court of Columbia County Washington Territory holding terms at Day- ton.
Before Hon. William G. Langford Judge of the above named Court and Associ- ate Justice of the Subpoena Court of Washing- ton Territory
Territory of Washington County of Columbia } SS
The United States of America to N.R. Marquiss

Greeting: We com- mand you that you have the body of S.M. McFarland by you imprisoned and detained as it is said, together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and detention by whatever named said S. M. McFarland shall be called or charged be- fore William G. Langford Judge of the District Court of Columbia County, Washington Territory holding terms at Day ton, as the court rooms in Walla Walla, Walla Walla County, Wash- ington Territory, forethrough said day do and receive which shall there and then be considered, concerning the said S.M. McFarland and have you there and true this writ.

Witness the Hon. William G. Langford Judge of the District Court of Columbia County, Washington Territory, holding terms at Dayton, and Associate Justice of the Subpoena Court of Washington Territory, this 9th day of May 1888 Attest my hand and the seal of the said Dis- trict Court affixed this the day and your above written
J.W. Jessel Clerk By W.J. Ellis Deputy
In the matter of the application for Writ of Habeas Cor- pus
Filed May 9 1888 JW Jessel Clerk. By W J Ellis Deputy.
JW Jessel Clerk By W J Ellis Deputy
Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla } SS

I NR Marquiss Sheriff of Columbia County Washington Territory do hereby certify that in obedience to the within Writ and have this 10th day of May 1888 served the same in the within named S. M. McFarland in Columbia County Washington Territory and now have him before the court together with Statement and by hold the said SM McFarland
N R Marquiss County Wash Terr
